name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

1.name: Divine Sense
1.description: The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor, and powerful good rings like heavenly music in your ears. As an action, you can open your awareness to detect such forces. Until the end of your next turn, you know the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet of you that is not behind total cover. You know the type (celestial, fiend, or undead) of any being whose presence you sense, but not its identity.

1.name: Lay on Hands
1.description: Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of hit points equal to your paladin level Ã— 5. As an action, you can touch a creature and draw power from the pool to restore a number of hit points to that creature, up to the maximum amount remaining in your pool. You can also expend 5 hit points from your pool to cure the target of one disease or neutralize one poison affecting it.

2.name: Fighting Style
2.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options: Defense, Dueling, Great Weapon Fighting, or Protection.

options.name: Defense
options.description: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

options.name: Dueling
options.description: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

options.name: Great Weapon Fighting
options.description: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon that you are wielding with two hands, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

options.name: Protection
options.description: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. You must be wielding a shield.

2.name: Spellcasting
2.description: You have learned to draw on divine magic through meditation and prayer to cast spells as a cleric does. You prepare spells from the paladin spell list.

2.name: Divine Smite
2.description: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend one spell slot to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is 2d8 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus 1d8 for each spell level higher than 1st, to a maximum of 5d8. The damage increases by 1d8 if the target is an undead or a fiend, to a maximum of 6d8.

3.name: Divine Health
3.description: The divine magic flowing through you makes you immune to disease.

3.name: Sacred Oath
3.description: When you reach 3rd level, you swear the oath that binds you as a paladin forever. Up to this time you have been in a preparatory stage, committed to the path but not yet sworn to it. Your choice grants you features at 3rd level and again at 7th, 15th, and 20th level.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: You can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. You can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

5.name: Aura of Protection
5.description: Starting at 6th level, whenever you or a friendly creature within 10 feet of you must make a saving throw, the creature gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier (with a minimum bonus of +1). You must be conscious to grant this bonus. At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

6.name: Channel Divinity
6.description: Your oath allows you to channel divine energy to fuel magical effects. Each oath provides two Channel Divinity options. You start with one use, and regain expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: You can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. You can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

10.name: Aura of Courage
10.description: Starting at 10th level, you and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you can't be frightened while you are conscious. At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

11.name: Improved Divine Smite
11.description: By 11th level, you are so suffused with righteous might that all your melee weapon strikes carry divine power with them. Whenever you hit a creature with a melee weapon, the creature takes an extra 1d8 radiant damage.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement
12.description: You can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. You can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

14.name: Cleansing Touch
14.description: You can use your action to end one spell on yourself or on one willing creature that you touch. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once). You regain expended uses when you finish a long rest.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: You can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. You can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

18.name: Aura Improvements
18.description: The range of your auras increases to 30 feet.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: You can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. You can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.

subclasses.name: Oath of Devotion
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear the Oath of Devotion are committed to the ideals of justice, virtue, and order.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed. These spells are always prepared, and they don't count against the number of spells you can prepare each day.

3.name: Channel Divinity
3.description: When you take this oath at 3rd level, you gain the following two Channel Divinity options.

options.name: Sacred Weapon
options.description: As an action, you can imbue one weapon that you are holding with positive energy, using your Channel Divinity. For 1 minute, you add your Charisma modifier to attack rolls made with that weapon (with a minimum bonus of +1). The weapon also emits bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light 20 feet beyond that. If the weapon is not already magical, it becomes magical for the duration.

options.name: Turn the Unholy
options.description: As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring fiends and undead, using your Channel Divinity. Each fiend or undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage.

7.name: Aura of Devotion
7.description: Starting at 7th level, you and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you can't be charmed while you are conscious. At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

15.name: Purity of Spirit
15.description: Beginning at 15th level, you are always under the effects of a protection from evil and good spell.

20.name: Holy Nimbus
20.description: At 20th level, as an action, you can emanate an aura of sunlight. For 1 minute, bright light shines from you in a 30-foot radius, and dim light shines 30 feet beyond that. Whenever an enemy creature starts its turn in the bright light, the creature takes 10 radiant damage. In addition, for the duration, you have advantage on saving throws against spells cast by fiends or undead.

subclasses.name: Oath of the Ancients
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear the Oath of the Ancients are committed to the ideals of light, kindness, and preservation of nature.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain additional spells at specific levels, always prepared.

3.name: Channel Divinity (Ancients)
3.description: You gain two Channel Divinity options: Nature's Wrath and Turn the Faithless.

7.name: Aura of Warding
7.description: You and friendly creatures within 10 feet have resistance to damage from spells. Increases to 30 feet at 18th level.

15.name: Undying Sentinel
15.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You don't age magically, and you can't be aged magically.

20.name: Elder Champion
20.description: As an action, you can gain the following benefits for 1 minute: regain 10 hit points at the start of each of your turns, cast a paladin spell as a bonus action, and enemies within 10 feet have disadvantage on saving throws against your paladin spells and Channel Divinity options.

subclasses.name: Oath of Vengeance
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear the Oath of Vengeance are committed to punishing wrongdoers by any means necessary.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed. These spells are always prepared, and they don't count against the number of spells you can prepare each day.

3.name: Channel Divinity
3.description: When you take this oath at 3rd level, you gain the following two Channel Divinity options.

options.name: Abjure Enemy
options.description: As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer of denunciation, using your Channel Divinity. Choose one creature within 60 feet of you that you can see. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw, unless it is immune to being frightened. Fiends and undead have disadvantage on this saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is frightened for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. While frightened, the creature's speed is 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed. On a successful save, the creature's speed is halved for 1 minute or until the creature takes any damage.

options.name: Vow of Enmity
options.description: As a bonus action, you can utter a vow of enmity against a creature you can see within 10 feet of you, using your Channel Divinity. You gain advantage on attack rolls against the creature for 1 minute or until it drops to 0 hit points or falls unconscious.

mechanics.duration: 1 minute or until target drops to 0 hp or unconscious

7.name: Relentless Avenger
7.description: By 7th level, your supernatural focus helps you close off a foe's retreat. When you hit a creature with an opportunity attack, you can move up to half your speed immediately after the attack and as part of the same reaction. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

15.name: Soul of Vengeance
15.description: Starting at 15th level, the authority with which you speak your Vow of Enmity gives you greater power over your foe. When a creature under the effect of your Vow of Enmity makes an attack, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature if it is within range.

20.name: Avenging Angel
20.description: At 20th level, you can assume the form of an angelic avenger. Using your action, you undergo a transformation. For 1 hour, you gain the following benefits: Wings sprout from your back and grant you a flying speed of 60 feet. You emanate an aura of menace in a 30-foot radius. The first time any enemy creature enters the aura or starts its turn there during a battle, the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. Attack rolls against frightened creatures have advantage.

subclasses.name: Oath of Conquest
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear this oath seek to crush the forces of chaos and establish dominion over the weak.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain additional spells at specific levels, always prepared, including armor of Agathys, command, hold person, and spiritual weapon.

3.name: Channel Divinity (Conquest)
3.description: You gain two Channel Divinity options: Conquering Presence and Guided Strike.

7.name: Aura of Conquest
7.description: Creatures frightened of you have their speed reduced to 0, and take psychic damage when starting their turn in your aura.

15.name: Scornful Rebuke
15.description: When you are hit by an attack, the attacker takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

20.name: Invincible Conqueror
20.description: As an action, you gain resistance to all damage, extra attack, and critical hits on 19-20 for 1 minute.

subclasses.name: Oath of Redemption
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear this oath believe that any person can be redeemed and that peace is always the best answer.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain additional spells at specific levels, always prepared, including sanctuary, sleep, calm emotions, and hold person.

3.name: Channel Divinity (Redemption)
3.description: You gain two Channel Divinity options: Emissary of Peace and Rebuke the Violent.

7.name: Aura of the Guardian
7.description: When a creature within 10 feet takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage instead.

15.name: Protective Spirit
15.description: At the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points if you're below half your hit point maximum.

20.name: Emissary of Redemption
20.description: You gain resistance to all damage from other creatures. When someone damages you, they take radiant damage equal to half the damage you took.

subclasses.name: Oath of Glory
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear this oath believe they are destined for greatness and seek to achieve legendary deeds.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain additional spells at specific levels, always prepared, including guiding bolt, heroism, enhance ability, and magic weapon.

3.name: Channel Divinity (Glory)
3.description: You gain two Channel Divinity options: Peerless Athlete and Inspiring Smite.

7.name: Aura of Alacrity
7.description: You and friendly creatures within 5 feet of you gain a bonus to their walking speed.

15.name: Glorious Defense
15.description: When you or a creature you can see within 10 feet is hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to grant a bonus to AC.

20.name: Living Legend
20.description: You gain advantages on Charisma checks and can use your Channel Divinity twice between rests.

subclasses.name: Oath of the Watchers
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear this oath seek to protect the mortal realm from extraplanar threats.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain additional spells at specific levels, always prepared, including alarm, detect magic, moonbeam, and see invisibility.

3.name: Channel Divinity (Watchers)
3.description: You gain two Channel Divinity options: Watcher's Will and Abjure the Extraplanar.

7.name: Aura of the Sentinel
7.description: You and your allies within 10 feet gain a bonus to Initiative rolls.

15.name: Vigilant Rebuke
15.description: When you or a creature you can see within 30 feet succeeds on an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, you can use your reaction to deal force damage to the attacker.

20.name: Mortal Bulwark
20.description: You gain truesight, advantage on attack rolls against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, and fiends, and can banish such creatures when you hit them.

subclasses.name: Oath of the Crown
subclasses.description: Paladins who swear this oath dedicate themselves to serving society and the ideals of civilization.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain additional spells at specific levels, always prepared, including command, compelled duel, warding bond, and zone of truth.

3.name: Channel Divinity (Crown)
3.description: You gain two Channel Divinity options: Champion Challenge and Turn the Tide.

7.name: Divine Allegiance
7.description: When a creature within 5 feet takes damage, you can use your reaction to take that damage instead.

15.name: Unyielding Spirit
15.description: You have advantage on saving throws against effects that would paralyze or stun you.

20.name: Exalted Champion
20.description: Your presence on the battlefield inspires allies and demoralizes enemies. You gain resistance to all damage and your allies have advantage on death saving throws.

subclasses.name: Oathbreaker
subclasses.description: A paladin who breaks their sacred oaths to pursue dark ambitions or serve an evil power.

3.name: Oath Spells
3.description: You gain additional spells at specific levels, always prepared, including hellish rebuke, inflict wounds, crown of madness, and darkness.

3.name: Channel Divinity (Oathbreaker)
3.description: You gain two Channel Divinity options: Control Undead and Dreadful Aspect.

7.name: Aura of Hate
7.description: You and fiends and undead within 10 feet gain a bonus to melee weapon damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

15.name: Supernatural Resistance
15.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.

20.name: Dread Lord
20.description: You surround yourself with an aura of gloom that poisons and frightens your enemies.
